name: Purificator!
description:
Wave survival placed in hell!

Survive infinite waves in hell! 

Kill as many demons as you can and become the PURIFICATOR!

Developed for the #7dfps2021 

Controls:

WASD -> Move

Space -> Jump

L. Shift -> Sprint

L. Mouse -> Fire

R. Mouse -> Aim

Mouse Wheel / 1, 2, 3 -> Change Weapon

R -> Reload

Credits:

Proxy Games - Low Poly Free Vegetation Kit (Unity Asset Store)

MentalDreams - Weapon Soldier Sounds Pack (Unity Asset Store)

Azthereom
